name: UnStealth
description:
This little game is the result of the premise "a stealth game in which you are like a bull in a china store". Your are breaking stuff constantly and announcing yourself in the loudest way possible. 

Reach the farthest end of the room avoiding the guards. But don't be too noisy or they'll find you!

Move the character with the cursor. To exit the application, simply press escape. Enjoy!

NOTE: due to packaging problems, the AI doesn't work as intended. I hope the game is still fun to play though.
